name: Failure Makes Life Easier
description:
<<MAKE SURE TO CLICK THE FULL SCREEN BUTTON WHEN YOU PLAY, OTHERWISE IT WILL NOT FORMAT CORRECTLY! Thank you :)>>

Failure Makes Life Easier is a (very) short, heartfelt and inspirational game where you learn that failure isn't bad. This game was made in 2 days, by Jack "jabafemal" Mallett for the WOWIE Game Jam 3.0. This is my first "complete"(ish) game and my first attended game jam. I had alot of fun making the game, and I hope you have at least some fun playing it :)
